<div class="fdesc">

A SightEvent represents any visible event to which other objects or
people might react. \[DEFINED IN SENSORY EXTENSION\]

`class `**`SightEvent`**` :   `[`SensoryEvent`](../object/SensoryEvent.html)

</div>
